info.notes: This is the default language of Automail. This key should have all the translation keys, while other translations don't have to. I'm not a native speaker, but I try to stick to British English here (feel free to britpick!). You can make translation files for other version of English too if you want, name it something like 'English (US)', and put 'English' in the fallback array. You need only include the keys that are different.

keys.$forumMedia_backlink: Add a link back to a work's database page on its forum feed
keys.$settings_export_description: Might come in handy to keep a backup if you do stuff like wiping your browser cache/storage, which will wipe your Automail settings too
keys.$settings_CSSadd: Add custom CSS to your profile. This will be visible to others with the script.
keys.$customCSS_description: Enable custom profile CSS and replacement pinned activities
keys.$settings_CSSlinkTip: (You can also use a direct link to a stylesheet)
keys.$settings_pinnedActivity: Add a pinned activity to your profile
keys.$setting_moreStats: Show an additional tab on the stats page
keys.$setting_CSSmobileTags: Don't hide tag voting from media pages on mobile
keys.$setting_infoTable: Use a two-column table layout for info on media pages
keys.$setting_reinaDark: Add a High Contrast Dark site theme [by Reina]
keys.$setting_MALserial: Add MAL serialisation info to manga
keys.$cssTooBig: Custom CSS is over 1MB. Make it smaller, or use a link instead.
keys.$cssfavs_description: Use 5-width favourite layout at all screen sizes
keys.$debug_tip: (Hey, it would be nice if you include this file when you report bugs. Makes my life easier)
keys.$profileBackground_help2: Tip: Use a colour with transparency, to work better with both light and dark themes. Example:
keys.$profileBackground_help3: Tip2: Do you want a faded image, staying fixed in place, and filling the screen? This is how:
keys.$notification_replyReply_1person_1reply: replied to activity you're subscribed to.
keys.$notification_newMedia: was recently added to the site.
keys.$notification_forumCommentLike: liked your comment, in the forum thread
keys.$notification_forumMention: mentioned you, in the forum thread
keys.$notifications_softBlock_description1: Hide notifications from specific people. A much less drastic solution than blocking them entirely (if that's what you actually want, go to their profile and click the little down arrow beside the 'Follow' button).
keys.$notifications_softBlock_description2: The notifications aren't gone, just hidden. 'Show default notifications' will make them visible. Un-soft-blocking will also bring them back. You may also be interested in the 'Notification Dot Colours' and 'Block stuff in the home feed' sections on the settings page.
keys.$notifications_softBlock_description3: Soft blocked users will still show up in grouped notifications, since that's not extra spam.
keys.$timeline_search_description: Looking for the activities of someone else?
keys.$noScrollPosts_description: Display all status posts in full regardless of their length
keys.$ALbuttonReload_description: Make the 'AL' button reload the feeds on the homepage
keys.$myThreads_description: Add a 'my threads' link in the forum
keys.$piracy_message: THIS BE BAD LINK, IT'S NOW VEWY DISPOSED OF OwO (click the report button to call the mods on this naughty user)
keys.$compare_listStatus:
any list status
click to toggle
keys.$404_private_or_noUser: {0} does not exist or has a private profile
keys.$recs_description:
Each pair is one you like + one you haven't started
Best match first
keys.$module_unicodifier_description: Convert emojis so they work on anilist
keys.$module_unicodifier_extendedDescription:
Anilist doesn't handle some Unicode characters correctly, leading to truncated posts. This module coverts them to HTML entity escape codes instead, which the site can handle (they can easily do this themselves if they want to)
Original idea by the great GoBusto: https://files.kiniro.uk/unicodifier.html
keys.$search_hint: Hint: Hit Ctrl-S to quickly toggle Quick Search
keys.$relations_description: Add separate tabs on the social page for various types of followers
keys.$additionalTranslation_description: Translate additional parts of the Anilist UI
keys.$twoColumnFeed_description: Split the home feed into two columns
keys.$markdown_help_description: Add a markdown helper to the bottom left corner
keys.$markdown_help_imageUpload: (you must upload it somewhere else to get a link)
keys.$stats_TVEpisodesRemaining: TV episodes remaining for current shows:
keys.$stats_globalDeviation_comment: (standard deviation from the global average of each entry)
keys.$stats_ratingEntropy_comment: bits/rating (higher number = more fine-grained ratings. Usually between 1 - 6)
keys.$stats_regularTags: Regular tags to include (applied on reload):
keys.$make3x3_title: Click this button, then 9 entries on your list
keys.$forum_singleThread: You're viewing a single comment. View the entire thread?
keys.$colourPicker_description: Add a colour picker in the footer for adjusting the site themes
keys.$terms_description: Add a low bandwidth feed to the https://anilist.co/terms page
keys.$terms_privacyPolicy_title: This page usually shows the privacy policy of Anilist. Click to get the default view
keys.$terms_signin: This module does not work without signing in to Automail
keys.$socialTab_tooManyChapters: Most likely the database total has been updated
keys.$query_autorecs_info: Top picks, based on your ratings, the ratings of others, and the recommendation database. Best matches on top
keys.$mobileFriendly_description: Mobile Friendly mode. Disables some modules not working properly on mobile, and adjusts others
keys.$hideLikes_description: Hide like notifications. Will not affect the notification count
keys.$settingsTip_description: Show a notice on the notification page for where the script settings can be found
keys.$settingsTip_extendedDescription: Options with the üõà button has more information available if you click it
keys.$settings_errorInvalidActivity: must be a direct link to an activity or an activity ID
keys.$dismissDot_description: Show a spec to dismiss notifications when signed in
keys.$socialTab_description: Media social tab average score, progress and notes
keys.$socialTabFeed_extendedDescription: 'Has replies' is the only filter that works if not signed in with the script. A 'Following' filter becomes available if you do.
keys.$forumMedia_description: Add the tagged media to the forum preview on the home page
keys.$forumMedia_extendedDescription: The forum preview only shows one tag by default, so it's just going to say 'anime' or 'manga' without telling you which media it's about. This module adds a second tag, shortening the title somewhat if there's not enough space.
keys.$draw3x3_description: Add a button to lists to create 3x3's from list entries. Click the button, and then select nine entries
keys.$subTitleInfo_description: Add basic data below the title on media pages
keys.$entryScore_description: Add your score and progress to media pages
keys.$activityTimeline_description: Link your activities in the social tab of media, and between individual activities
keys.$CSScompactBrowse_description: Make the browse section more compact
keys.$CSSverticalNav_description: Alternative browse mode [with vertical navbar by Kuwabara]
keys.$CSSprofileClutter_description: Remove clutter from profiles (milestones, history chart, genres)
keys.$CSSdecimalPoint_description: Give whole numbers a ".0" suffix when using the 10 point decimal scoring system
keys.$CSSdarkDropdown_description: Use a dark menu dropdown in dark mode
keys.$completedScore_description: Show the score on the activity when people complete something
keys.$droppedScore_description: Show the score on the activity when people drop something
keys.$replaceNativeTags_description: Full lists for tags, staff and studios in stats
keys.$cleanSocial_description: Place 'following' before 'forum threads' on media social tabs
keys.$nonJumpScroll_description: Stop activity content from jumping around when using scrollbars [by Reina]
keys.$blockWord_description: Hide status posts containing this word:
keys.$blockWord_extendedDescription:
RegEx syntax accepted too, do not use slash /delimeters/.
Most common use, blocking multiple words: "word1|word2|word3"
keys.$statusBorder_description: Colour code the right border of activities by media status
keys.$betterReviewRatings_description: Add the total number of ratings to reviews on the home page
keys.$browseFilters_description: Add more sorting options to browse
keys.$tagIndex_description: Show an index of custom tags on anime and manga lists
keys.$dubMarker_description: Add a notice on top of the other data on an anime page if a dub is available
keys.$dubMarker_extendedDescription: Works by checking the database for voice actors
keys.$mangaGuess_description: Make a guess for the number of chapters for releasing manga
keys.$allStudios_description: Include companies that aren't animation studios in the extended studio stats table
keys.$noRewatches_description: Don't include progress from rewatches/rereads in stats
keys.$hideCustomTags_description: Hide the custom tag tables by default
keys.$negativeCustomList_description: Add an entry in the custom tag tables with all media not on a custom list
keys.$globalCustomList_description: Add an entry in the custom tag tables with all media
keys.$timeToCompleteColumn_description: Add a 'time to complete' column to the tag tables
keys.$feedCommentFilter_description: Add filter options to the feeds to hide posts with few comments or likes
keys.$browseSubmenu_description: Replace the native 'browse' submenu when using the vertical nav
keys.$sfw_description: A less flashy version of the site for school or the workplace
keys.$milestone_description: Add total episodes and volumes to profile milestones
keys.$dblclickZoom_extendedDescription: There are likely better browser accessibility addons for this.
keys.$hideOtherThreads_description: Hide additional low-quality forum threads on the home page
keys.$hideOtherThreads_extendedDescription:
Curated list of high-volume threads with little reading value.
Request threads added: https://github.com/hohMiyazawa/Automail/issues

https://anilist.co/forum/thread/15346
https://anilist.co/forum/thread/2340/
https://anilist.co/forum/thread/1
"Where can I watch/read/find"
keys.$no_threads: No forum threads yet, create one?
keys.$automailAPI_description: Enable an API for other scripts to control this script [Don't enable this unless you know what you are doing]
keys.$progressBar_description: Add progress bars to the list previews
keys.$embedHentai_description: Make cards for links to age restricted content
keys.$previewMaxRows_description: Alternative list preview, max rows per section
keys.$homeScroll_description: Make the 'home' button scroll to the top on the home feed
keys.$limitProgress10_description: Limit the 'in progress' sections to 10 entries
keys.$limitProgress8_description: Limit the 'in progress' sections to 8 entries
keys.$showRecVotes_description: Always show the recommendation voting data
keys.$hideAWC_description: Hide AWC threads from the forum preview on the home page. Number of AWC-free threads to display:
keys.$expandRight_description: Load the expanded view of 'in progress' in the usual place instead of full width if left in that state [weird hack]
keys.$noImagePolyfill_description: Add fallback text for missing images in the sidebar and favourite sections
keys.$shortRomaji_description: Short romaji titles for everyday use. Life is too short for light novel titles
keys.$titlecaseRomaji_description: Uppercase killer. Title alias pack to turn unnecessary UPPERCASE to Titlecase
keys.$rightToLeft_extendedDescription:
A baseline for adjusting Anilist to act more like a native RTL language site would.
Not complete.
keys.$termsFeedNoImages_description: Do not load images on the low bandwidth feed
keys.$termsFeedNoImages_extendedDescription:
Refers to the feed located at https://anilist.co/terms if the setting 'low bandwidth feed' is turned on.
For very slow connections, images are going to be the most difficult part of the page to load.
See if your addblocker also supports setting a size limit for media, which may help if you are struggling.
keys.$moreImports_description: Add more list import and list export options
keys.$plussMinus_description: Add + and - buttons to quickly change scores on your list
keys.$navbarDroptext_description: Allow drag-and-drop of text into navbar for search
